message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by both myself and you, ensuring a fair transaction. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. Don't miss this opportunity to acquire a product that truly exceeds expectations. Let me know if you're interested in securing it at this exclusive rate.
